caption.p: ( A) Orthogonal partial least squares discriminant analysis (OPLS-DA) for Dodonaea viscosa Nanyuki and Machakos populations. The OPLS-DA test separation of Machakos and Nanyuki populations of D. viscosa was based on T score 1 which was 30% separating Machakos population on the left and the Nanyuki population on the right; ( B) Loadings of OPLS-DA of LC-MS spectra for D. viscosa Nanyuki and Machakos populations showing the compounds that are important discriminants.
